title: In Our Blood
description: Blackmailed. Forced to leave everything I ever knew and wanted all because I loved too much. Everything changed with my brother's death, and now I'm back where I belong. Seventeen years ago I left a whole life behind. I wanted him then and I still want him now. Only itâ€™s not that simple, time has made everything complicated.*Warning* contains mature content suitable for adults 18+, and an extremely taboo storyline. MMPreviously published in A Family Affair Anthology as Intimate Relations
author: Ally Vance
